Smart Toothbrush: Develop an electric toothbrush with an integrated AI-powered app that tracks brushing habits and provides personalized feedback to improve oral hygiene. The app can also monitor brushing patterns and detect any potential oral health issues, such as gum disease or tooth decay, and provide recommendations for improvement.

Portable Toothbrush Charger: Create a compact, portable toothbrush charger that can be easily carried in a purse or backpack. This charger can be used to recharge toothbrushes on-the-go, making it ideal for travel or for people who are always on-the-move.

Personalized Toothbrush Designer: Develop an online platform that allows users to design and customize their own electric toothbrushes. Users can choose from a variety of colors, handle shapes, and bristle styles to create a unique toothbrush that reflects their personal preferences.

Toothbrush Sanitizer: Create a toothbrush sanitizer that uses UV light technology to kill bacteria and germs on the toothbrush. This sanitizer can be placed in the bathroom or carried in a purse or backpack for easy use on-the-go.

Toothbrush for Kids: Design an electric toothbrush specifically for children, with bright colors, fun shapes, and interactive features such as built-in games or sounds. This toothbrush can help make brushing teeth a fun and engaging experience for kids, encouraging them to develop good oral hygiene habits from an early age.
